entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-11
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] Input binding is not supported well with Shadow DOM elements #60885
  • Perf improvement: json #60877
  • Quarantine EnhancedNavigationScrollBehavesSameAsBrowserOnNavigation #60875
  • Quarantine RadioButtonGetsResetAfterSubmittingEnhancedForm #60873
  • Microsoft Security Advisory CVE-2025-24070: .NET Elevation of Privilege Vulnerability #60871
  • Custom generator for sessionKey in SessionMiddleware #60869
  • [Blazor] Blazor Web App with multiple secure API not working with OIDC #60868
  • Generated OpenAPI docs overrides [Consumes] attribute through [FromForm] #60867
  • [Bug] Conditional attribute rendering #60864
  • Perf improvement: antiforgery-generation, fortunes_ef, multiple_queries #60862
  • File(stream, ...) does not dispose the stream #60860

Closed

  • update project templates use primary constructors #52893
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Need to install Windows Hosting Bundle using dotnet-install.ps1 script #60191
  • [Infrastructure] error : Generate SBOM manifest (alpine319WithNode) #60108
  • [Blazor] JS assets in `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.CustomElements` are not getting included #60859
  • Reconnection UI doesn't display if Blazor Web App is globally interactive #60866
  • "dotnet new webapiaot" should include OpenAPI support #59564
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Description parameter of ProducesResponseTypeAttribute does not work in minimal API app #60518
    Backlog
  • JsonSerializerContext can't have mutliple dtos with the same name #60863
  • [Blazor] Static SSR - [SupplyParameterFromForm] parameter null on empty form data (eg. unchecked InputCheckbox) #60837
  • Blazor Web App takes a long time to shut down when pressing Ctrl-C #60815
  • Perf improvement: caching, json_middleware, single_query #60833
  • Perf improvement: httpsys-hostheader-mismatch #60826
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, mTls-handshakes-kestrel #60855
  • Class library projects are added as assembly: ApplicationPart in razor application assembly #60648
  • An invalid reference is generated for a object that contains two properties of type List<List<string>> (both of the same type). #60381
  • Fix self-referential schema handling for collection-based types #60339
    9.0.x
  • [10.0-preview.1] ASP.NET `RouteHandlerAnalyzer` - `System.IndexOutOfRangeException` #60719
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0] Fix ResponseCompressionMiddleware tests #60884
    area-middleware, 8.0.x
  • Quarantine EnhancedNavigationScrollBehavesSameAsBrowserOnNavigation #60876
    area-blazor
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2660536 #60872
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Update project templates use primary constructors and collection expressions #59712
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 10.0-preview3
  • Merging internal commits for release/8.0 #60879
    area-infrastructure, 8.0.15
  • Merging internal commits for release/9.0 #60880
    area-infrastructure, 9.0.4
  • [release/2.3] Merge from internal #60878
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/2.3] Delete SignalR ts client #60882
    area-signalr
  • Quarantine RadioButtonGetsResetAfterSubmittingEnhancedForm test #60874
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview3
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-preview.3.25122.1 #60564
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 10.0-preview3
  • Add Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi to the webapiaot template (with an optional flag to disable it) #60337
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 10.0-preview3
  • Setting the Description in a ProducesResponseTypeAttribute works correctly for Minimal API #60539
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 10.0-preview3
  • Fix apostrophes in ReconnectModal.razor.js #60816
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview3
  • [release/9.0] [Blazor] Fix custom elements JS assets not being included in build output #60858
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 9.0.4
  • Add more schema tests #60822
    area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 10.0-preview3
  • Fix self-referential schema handling in collection schemas #60410
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0.4
  • Check length of TypeArguments before accessing via index #60742
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution, 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • Support input validation for minimal APIs via generic resolver model #60724
    area-minimal
  • [Blazor] Support for declaratively persisting component and services state #60634
    area-blazor
  • Add SignalR client log for stream item binding failure #60857
    area-signalr
  • Add `NotFound` method in `NavigationManager` for interactive and static rendering #60752
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-routing, .NET 10 Planning
  • Fix IIS recycle regressions #59998
    feature-iis, pending-ci-rerun, area-networking
  • JSInterop: Enable returning null for a nullable value type #60850
    area-blazor, community-contribution
